long_description: If you're a progressing rider looking for a binding that cushions landings, offers a great fit and is always comfortable, choose the all-mountain, women-specific Ride VXn bindings. Foundation Chassis are contoured and profiled for lightweight precision; quick-adjust heel-cup design allows micro-adjustments in seconds. Slignback(TM) highbacks are specifically shaped for women, and offer freestyle flex and performance; tool-free adjustable forward lean. RAD(TM) ankle straps offer a comfortable fit for all-day shred sessions. Convertible ThinGrip toe straps with lightweight rubber webbing can be worn across the top or over the front of boots to hold you in tight; you can change positions on the fly. Wedgie(TM) 1.5 fixed-position footbeds offer a subtle amount of angle, providing the perfect mix of comfort and lateral support for the advancing rider. Durable aluminum AstroGlyde OG Ratchets buckles. Ride VXn snowboard bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel snowboards, disc conversion kit is sold separately.
